newsitem.title: HONG KONG: New Asia Realty year net down 45.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: New Asia Realty year net down 45.4 pct.

text.p: Earnings per A Shr (H.K. cents) 415.0 vs 755.0
Earnings per B Shr (H.K. cents) 83.0 vs 151.0
Company name New Asia Realty and Trust Co
NOTE - New Asia Realty and Trust is an investment holding and property company. Net is after an exceptional gain on disposal of long term listed investments.

Total dividend for year per A share is 90 H.K. cents (including interim dividend of 20 cents) vs 105 cents (including interim dividend and non-recurrent special dividend), and per B share is 18 cents (including interim of four cents) vs 21 cents (including interim dividend and non-recurrent special dividend).
